Package com.uno.shared.networking

Interface OrderServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderServerImpl
public interface OrderServer extends Remote
An interface that creates order object in database.

  • Method Details

    • registerClient

      void registerClient(OrderClientCallBack client) throws RemoteException
      A method that registers the client in the server
      Parameters:
      client - The object that is registered
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If connection failed

    • createOrder

      void createOrder(Order order) throws RemoteException
      Method that creates an Order object in database.
      Parameters:
      order - The order that will be created in the database.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If it is not possible to receive the object.

    • getOrders

      ArrayList<Order> getOrders() throws RemoteException
      Method that gets all orders from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of Order Objects
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If it's not possible to call the method

    • createPreOrder

      void createPreOrder(Order order, Reservation reservation) throws RemoteException
      Method that creates a PreOrder object in database.
      Parameters:
      order - takes order as the first of the two parameters
      reservation - takes reservation as the second of the two parameters
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If it's not possible to receive the object

    • editOrder

      void editOrder(Order newOrder) throws RemoteException
      A method that send order that has to be eddited and the new information.
      Parameters:
      newOrder - The information that will be set in the old object.
      Throws:
      RemoteException
